Description: You fire a powerful beam of pure light. The line is 80 feet long and 5 feet wide, and all creatues caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The damage type is dependant on the Drive the user holds. (Burn Drive - Fire, Chill Drive - Ice, Douse Drive - Water, Shock Drive - Electric)
